name: spark
description: A data repository to get ideas of the ground

scripts.dbInit1: echo "db.createCollection('sensorData', { 'timeseries': {timeField: 'timestamp', metaField: 'id', granularity: 'minutes'}, expireAfterSeconds: 7890000})" | mongosh spark
scripts.dbInit2: echo "db.createCollection('pointData', { 'timeseries': {timeField: 'timestamp', metaField: 'id', granularity: 'minutes'}, expireAfterSeconds: 7890000})" | mongosh spark

author: Matt Cole
